metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9925 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A logic issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue isfixed in iOS 13.6 and iPadOS 13.6, tvOS 13.4.8, watchOS 6.2.8, Safari13.1.2, iTunes 12.10.8 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 11.3, iCloud forWindows 7.20. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead touniversal cross site scripting.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-9925` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.28.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.28.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.28.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.28.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.28.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.28.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.28.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.28.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
qtwebkit-source package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
